content:
For issue #47511 there is a regression test added b y @nikomatsakis: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/src/test/ui/issues/issue-47511.rs
It was added in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/commit/0ee698e4a6bb2aaf49ed37d4dfa6188e5b069ce3

It feels to me that this test should be marked as known-bug instead? Function g shouldn't trigger an error right?
That could be changed to known-bug, yes.
Thanks! I'll do that then :+1:

Could / Should issue https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/47511 be renamed?
The ICE has been fixed for ages but the type alias lifetime constraint bug is what remains.
